ygData.subject: Ack! I'm KOS
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve written another poem in honor of my guild killing Sir Lucan (at least that s what got me started). Ack! I m KOS! I played my songs in newbie grounds Not
ygData.messageBody:
I've written another poem in honor of my guild killing Sir Lucan (at least
that's what got me started).

Ack! I'm KOS!

I played my songs in newbie grounds
Not realizing that my harmful sounds
Would make you want to strike me down
Ack! I'm KOS!

The froggies used to like me a lot
Then one day me and the Shin Lord fought
I can't believe what that tangle has wrought
Ack! I'm KOS!

Being nice is the path I take
But disliking me you can not fake
When you whack on me for going near your lake
Ack! I'm KOS!!

When I must travel I use your ring
But bears they have this deathwish thing
They attack me and cause your spells to fling
Ack! I'm KOS!

The bouncer scowls and beats his chest
Proclaiming to all that he's the best
Who hasn't heard the bouncer say "I's vic...I's vic...I won?"
Ack! I'm KOS!

There was a time when you didn't scowl
But then we took Sir Lucan out
Why didn't you just throw in the towel?
Ack! I'm KOS!

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 41 Bard of Qeynos
All Hail Scarab!
Solusek Ro
